title: Week of Character, Courage & Conscience: Should I Come Out Of Retirement To Save Lives?
description:
Terry is questioning ending his retirement and returning to the medical field to aid in the battle against the pandemic. - Dr. Laura: "True heroes knowingly put themselves in harm's way for the sake of others."

Would you prefer to stay in retirement or do the right thing? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com

Order Dr. Laura's book: "How Could You Do That?!: The Abdication of Character, Courage, and Conscience"

go to > https://www.drlaura.com/compare-books-and-courses-by-dr-laura

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. Become a Dr. Laura Family Member: https://www.drlaura.com/ See https://www.drlaura.com/privacy-policy for privacy information.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
